game.title: Chrono Trigger
game.synopsis: Chrono Trigger follows the adventures of a group of friends, including Crono and Lucca, as they journey through time to save the world from an evil force. The story begins in AD 1000 at the Millennial Fair in Truce and reaches its climax with a dramatic confrontation at the end. The ending sees the heroes returning to their own time and restoring peace to Guardia.
game.beginning: The game starts with Crono discovering the Time Egg at the fair
game.ending: Crono and his friends defeat the main antagonist and restore the timeline in Chrono City
